text: The Blonde from Peking (, , , also known as Peking Blonde) is a 1967 French- Italian-German adventure film written and directed by Nicolas Gessner. It is loosely based on the novel You Have Yourself a Deal by James Hadley Chase. == Cast == * Mireille Darc as Erika Olsen / Christine * Claudio Brook as Garland / Gandler * Giorgia Moll as Jinny / Nurse Peggy * Edward G.
